participant_1.name: Jonathan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, with a penchant for luxury and success.
participant_1.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i grew up in manhattan. i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, with a love for music and dance.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.
